title: Trump Forced to Debate at His Town Hall | Guest: John Jackson | 10/16/20
description:
President Trump and Joe Biden’s dueling town halls couldn’t have been more different. NBC’s moderator Savannah Guthrie practically debated Trump while ABC’s George Stephanopoulos was calm with Biden. Trump denounced white supremacy for the umpteenth time and was also asked about Q-Anon. C-Span’s Steve Scully, who was supposed to moderate a debate, admitted he lied about being hacked. Glenn proves just how left leaning the executives at Facebook and Twitter are. The Washington Post published leaked Trump-bashing quotes from Sen. Ben Sasse, and Glenn has quite the response. Glenn hears from his listeners. Heroes American Café owner John Jackson joins after his diner was shot at, allegedly for being pro-police.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
